name: Tens Unit
descr:
A regular TENS unit with adjustable pulse width, pulse rate, intensity, modes and a accurate timer of 15, 30 and 60 minutes, will stop output at pre-setting time.

Specifications: isolated dual channels, puls amplitude 0-80mA peak to peak into 500 ohm load, pulse rate adjustable from 2 Hz - 150 Hz, pulse width adjustable from 30 uS - 260 Us, 3 modes - B = Burst, N = Normal and M = Modulation.

Supplied as standard in a carry case, included leads, 9V battery, operating manual and 4 electrodes.
